file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 55-36-02-04 - FRONT FIXED-FAIRING POLYURETHANE FILM - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL FRONT FIXED-FAIRING POLYURETHANE FILM - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and apply the front fixed-fairing polyurethane film. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY FRONT FIXED-FAIRING POLYURETHANE ALL 55-36-02-000-801-A FILM - REMOVAL FRONT FIXED-FAIRING POLYURETHANE ALL 55-36-02-400-801-A FILM - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 55-36-02 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright Â© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 55-36-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. FRONT FIXED-FAIRING POLYURETHANE FILM - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the front fixed-fairing polyurethane film. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 321 Tail boom C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Spatula To remove the old film 1 available E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Tail boom H. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Prepare the new film with the old film as a template.
